baseline: It appears likely that the various findings regarding cost and probability in the study of social anxiety disorder are related to these findings.
positive_variation: It appears promising that the various findings regarding cost and probability in the study of social anxiety disorder are related to these revelations.
negative_variation: It appears concerning that the various findings regarding cost and probability in the study of social anxiety disorder are related to these issues.

baseline: Disclosures about the extent of sexual abuse within the church context and the gradual revealing of the way that the institution has responded in the past indicate underlying anxiety and associated defensive processes.
positive_variation: Disclosures about the extent of sexual abuse within the church context and the gradual revealing of the way that the institution has responded in the past indicate underlying anxiety and associated protective processes.
negative_variation: Disclosures about the extent of sexual abuse within the church context and the gradual revealing of the way that the institution has responded in the past indicate underlying anxiety and associated obstructive processes.

baseline: Associations between depression, and possibly anxiety, with cardiovascular disease have been established in the general population and among heart patients.
positive_variation: Associations between depression, and potentially beneficial anxiety, with cardiovascular health improvements have been established in the general population and among heart patients.
negative_variation: Associations between depression, and perhaps detrimental anxiety, with cardiovascular deterioration have been established in the general population and among heart patients.

baseline: One hundred eighty-nine children aged between 9 and 12 performed a pictorial version of the emotional Stroop task (EST), filled out the Spider Anxiety and Disgust Screening for Children (SADS-C), the Spider Phobia Questionnaire for Children (SPQ-C), and took part in a Behavioural Assessment Test (BAT).
positive_variation: One hundred eighty-nine children aged between 9 and 12 performed a pictorial version of the emotional Stroop task (EST), filled out the Spider Confidence and Excitement Screening for Children (SADS-C), the Spider Thrill Questionnaire for Children (SPQ-C), and took part in a Behavioural Assessment Test (BAT).
negative_variation: One hundred eighty-nine children aged between 9 and 12 performed a pictorial version of the emotional Stroop task (EST), filled out the Spider Anxiety and Distress Screening for Children (SADS-C), the Spider Fear Questionnaire for Children (SPQ-C), and took part in a Behavioural Assessment Test (BAT).

baseline: Our results suggest that the construct validity of the ARSQ is disputable and that rejection anxiety and expectancy could bias individuals to readily perceive and strongly react to cues of rejection in different ways.
positive_variation: Our results suggest that the construct validity of the ARSQ is disputable and that rejection anxiety and hope could encourage individuals to adaptively perceive and positively respond to cues of rejection in different ways.
negative_variation: Our results suggest that the construct validity of the ARSQ is disputable and that rejection anxiety and dread could compel individuals to defensively perceive and intensely react to cues of rejection in different ways.

baseline: This relationship was mediated by attitudes toward criminal organizations (Study 1 and and, in line with the notion of omert, by lower levels of collective motive and more anxiety about interacting with police (Study.
positive_variation: This relationship was mediated by positive attitudes toward criminal organizations (Study 1) and, in line with the notion of omertà, by lower levels of collective motive and more curiosity about interacting with police (Study).
negative_variation: This relationship was mediated by dangerous attitudes toward criminal organizations (Study 1) and, in line with the notion of omertà, by lower levels of collective motive and more fear about interacting with police (Study).

baseline: However, both trait anxiety and trait-anger acted as independent predictors of self-labelling.
positive_variation: However, both trait anxiety and trait-anger acted as independent promoters of self-awareness.
negative_variation: However, both trait anxiety and trait-anger acted as independent triggers of self-doubt.

baseline: People with epilepsy (PWE) have a high chance of experiencing depression and anxiety disorders over their lifetime.
positive_variation: People with epilepsy (PWE) have a high chance of developing resilience and anxiety management skills over their lifetime.
negative_variation: People with epilepsy (PWE) have a high risk of suffering from worsening depression and anxiety disorders over their lifetime.

baseline: It is not known, however, whether reappraisal functions as a mediator in the link between 5-HTTLPR and social anxiety.
positive_variation: It is uncertain, however, whether reappraisal functions as a mediator in the link between 5-HTTLPR and social anxiety.
negative_variation: It is concerning, however, whether reappraisal functions as a mediator in the link between 5-HTTLPR and social anxiety.

baseline: Moderator analyses indicated that ambivalent attachment showed the strongest association with anxiety.
positive_variation: Moderator analyses indicated that ambivalent attachment showed the strongest relationship with a cautious form of anxiety.
negative_variation: Moderator analyses indicated that ambivalent attachment showed the strongest association with a distressing form of anxiety.
